description:
The new Volkswagen ID.Buzz does the whole reboot thing quite well.

Enter at https://ridge.com/MKBHD for free to win a Tesla Cybertruck, Hennessey Velociraptor, or $100,000 cash from Ridge! 

Shot on iPhone 15 Pro
Hollyland Lark M2 Wireless Microphone: https://geni.us/jfBMTG
title: VW ID. Buzz Minibus Review: The Ultimate Reboot!
